/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the street below. The street is teeming with life, filled with cars, motorcycles, and pedestrians going about their day. The buildings lining the street are painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day.
